definitions.text: be a hindrance or obstacle to
examples: She is impeding the progress of our project

definitions.text: hinder or prevent the progress or accomplishment of
examples: His brother blocked him at every turn
The brace I have to wear is hindering my movements

definitions.text: located at or near the back of an animal
examples: the hinder part of a carcass

definitions.text: located at or near the back of an animal
examples: the hinder part of a carcass
